channel.title: Words on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Words on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Words
item.description: these words. do they have, possess, power? some wish not. some die so. they must. how could i explain you if they couldn’t. idieSo. they mean everything to me. yet they are only symbols. but they are me. can i not express myself so openly. so profoundly. i need this word. this power. and i need you. too. is that wrong, as well. i die so.
